title.rendered: 5 Magnificent Multipurpose WordPress Themes for Building Stunning Sites

content.rendered:
WordPress is the most popular CMS nowadays. It deserves to be your priority.

Currently, it is empowering more than 35% of CMS websites.

WordPress is phenomenal because it has successfully built the needs, as well as the solution to the website customization problems.

Let’s take a look at some of the best responsive and multi-purpose WordPress themes, that will mesmerize you. Here goes:

1. BeTheme

Looking for something that has 40+ features? Betheme is the best option, it provides you with 320+ professionally-designed pre-built websites. When it comes to website designing, there is nothing that this WordPress theme can’t handle.

Searching for a theme that perfectly suits your business needs is often a hectic and frustrating task, that can take hours. BeTheme lets you accomplish the same task within minutes. Looks like a miracle right? Well, indeed it is!

You can also take benefit from Be’s Muffin Builder, Options Panel, Shortcode Generator and other design options by just a single click. It staggers 130 full-fledged demo websites for you in unfathomable variety. We suggest you BeTheme, because it’s a top 5 ThemeForest best-seller, therefore, do give it a thought and don’t ignore.

2. UNCode

This is an era of competition. The capitalist society moves with the concept of survival of the fittest, therefore, you would also want to create a website that is award-winning. There is no doubt in it that UNCode has all the tools and features needed to produce award-winners. UNCode is a completely mesmerizing, amazing, well designed and multipurpose website theme available in the market.

It was built on a powerful Bootstrap framework, powered by HTML5 and CSS3. UNCode is masterfully crafted and developed by a team of dedicated developers, with a sophisticated and an expansive deployment of the greatest and latest Bootstrap, CSS3, and HTML5 technologies on the market.

It is also responsive to the bone. If your aims are high and you are ready to get all the fame by impressing huge fans, then try UNCode now!

3. Divi

Divi is a super amazing, incredibly cohesive, and entirely intuitive WordPress responsive multipurpose theme. It is packed with an ample collection of thoughtfully crafted and responsive templates, that seamlessly integrate to empower you to produce the most aesthetically accomplished websites known to man, in a minute.

Divi also offers social media integration, video/audio boxes, portfolios, sliders and pricing tables. Divi theme comes with a twenty plus default layouts and it also provides you with really cooperative and supportive development team, that helps you to get out of almost every situation. There is just no comparison to what you can achieve, in terms of beauty with Divi. Try it today!

4. Woffice

Woffice is a powerhouse of an intranet-building tool. It is a powerful, feature-rich, multipurpose WordPress theme. It is used by more than 7000 extranets/intranets and communities. With its demos and a quick installation process, it will help you set up your intranet without much effort at all.

It is a powerful WordPress theme with loads of features such as built-in extension, completely customizable, fully responsive, compatible with all modern browsers, files management, and project management made easy, built-in SLACK integration, multi-language support, and many more.

This theme is specially designed with 5 bundled plugins and 20+ built-in extensions. It also provides extensive online free services such as documentation, updater, etc. It also contains a widgetized dashboard, with 10+ custom widgets. It works with thousands of WordPress plugins, such as BBpress, WooCommerce, Visualizer, Wisechat, Learndash, etc.

The best of all, its turnaround time is between 4-8 hrs.

Altogether, Woffice is an amazing premium WordPress theme, with a comprehensive feature set for a company intranet website.

It’s highly recommended that you try out the online demo to see how this theme works and you can also get access to a full set of user documentation to help you build an intranet with WordPress.

5. XStore

It is a WooCommerce based theme, which is specially designed for business and e-shops. It provides you with a mega menu, that is extremely simple to use and comes with a 70 ready to go shops, to choose from. It takes less than one minute to install and later you can use XStore’s premium plugins like smart product reviewer 360 to dress up your store the way you like it.

This theme requires zero coding and technical knowledge, so you will less to worry about your website development, care more about improving your business.

These were the five WordPress themes required to create your super successful website.

These are customer-oriented themes and loved by many WordPress lovers.
